column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Zach - Thanks so much for coming through and for your awesome review. We have two additional spice levels that aren't printed on the menu: "Inferno" and "Double Inferno." One time
column2: a customer ordered "Quadruple Inferno." We considered having her sign a waiver beforehand -- kidding. We look forward to serving you again soon!
